# togglePanel(_:)

**Instance Method**

Toggles the visibility of the Media Library Browser.

## Declaration

```swift
@IBAction @MainActor func togglePanel(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The sender of the message.

## Displaying the Media Library Browser Panel

- **frame**: The frame, in global coordinates, used to display the Media Library Browser panel.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that determines whether the Media Library Browser panel is visible.
